description:
During testing of epel packages the discussion over why there is a requirement in nova for glance to be present, when nova and glance should be separate components https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=748490 this is due to /nova/image/glance.py line 43. 

Should nova really require glance or should they still be independent projects?
title: nova-manage db sync requires glance

comments.content:
During testing of epel packages the discussion over why there is a requirement in nova for glance to be present, when nova and glance should be separate components https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=748490 this is due to /nova/image/glance.py line 43. 

Should nova really require glance or should they still be independent projects?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~d-busby

comments.content: Also fyi this piece of code requires glance.client.Client, where as it would appear this has been renamed to V1Client.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~d-busby

comments.content:
Nova needs the glance client, because it needs to obtain certain information about the images to be used for booting an instance.  Currently, the glance client is packaged with the server, and they're pretty intertwined.  However, there is discussion on the mailing list right now about splitting all the clients out to address this issue.

And yes, glance's client is defined as V1Client; but if you look at the very bottom of glance/client.py, you'll see "Client = V1Client"; I'm not sure exactly when this went in, but this shouldn't be an issue…
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klmitch

comments.content: Actually I encounter this problem even I have installed both nova and glance on the same host which is a CentOS-5.4.  Is there a workaround about this issue?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yufang521247

comments.content: Nova should depend on a glance client-only package, but it seems we don't have that package available yet. 'nova-manage db sync' doesn't need to depend on glance at all, so we should definitely fix that.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

Author: Brian Waldon <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jul 30 13:12:18 2012 -0700

    Rewrite image code to use python-glanceclient
    
    This patch rewrites the Glance-specific code within Nova to use
    the new python-glanceclient library. The old client is deprecated
    in Folsom and should not be used in conjunction with
    python-glanceclient.
    
    This removes the dependency on installing 'glance' through pip.
    
    Implements bp integrate-python-glanceclient
    Fixes bug 880964
